ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds ground beef, ground pork, bulk pork sausage, uncooked ground turkey or uncooked bulk turkey sausage
2 14 ounce cans reduced-sodium beef broth or chicken broth
1 15 ounce can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 15 ounce can golden hominy, rinsed and drained
2 cups loose-pack frozen diced hash brown potatoes with onions and peppers
1 - 2 canned chipotle chile peppers in adobo sauce, finely chopped*
Toppings, such as sour cream, chopped avocado and/or shredded cheddar cheese (optional)
Toppings, such as sour cream, chopped avocado and/or shredded cheddar cheese (optional)
